attributes.action: make sure that all responses to closed petitions can actually be viewed instead of producing "Internal Server Error"s.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pages in the form http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/PageXXXXX.asp seem to be broken and there's no way to report dead links.

rejection.details: Please could you send any comments about the petitions system to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk and our webteam will endeavour to look into your concerns.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
